1001.name: ErrParseOAMComponentCode
1001.long_description: Error occurred while parsing application component in the OAM request made by Meshery Server
1001.probable_cause: Could not unmarshall configuration component received via ProcessOAM gRPC call into a valid Component struct
1001.suggested_remediation: Check if Meshery Server is creating valid component for ProcessOAM gRPC call. This error should never happen and can be reported as a bug in Meshery Server. Also, check if Meshery Server and adapters are referring to same component struct provided in MeshKit.

1002.name: ErrParseOAMConfigCode
1002.long_description: Error occurred while parsing configuration in the request made by Meshery Server
1002.probable_cause: Could not unmarshall OAM config received via ProcessOAM gRPC call into a valid Config struct
1002.suggested_remediation: Check if Meshery Server is creating valid config for ProcessOAM gRPC call. This error should never happen and can be reported as a bug in Meshery Server. Also, confirm that Meshery Server and Adapters are referring to same config struct provided in MeshKit

1004.name: ErrApplyHelmChartCode
1004.suggested_remediation: Use `helm verify` and `helm lint` to verify chart path and validity

1005.name: ErrMeshConfigCode
1005.long_description: Error getting MeshSpecKey config from in-memory configuration

1006.name: ErrConsulCoreComponentFailCode
1006.probable_cause: API version or Kind passed is empty
1006.suggested_remediation: Make sure API version and Kind are not empty

1007.name: ErrParseConsulCoreComponentCode
1007.short_description: Consul core component manifest parsing failing
1007.probable_cause: Could not marshall generated component to YAML

1009.name: ErrGetManifestNamesCode
1009.short_description: Unable to fetch manifest names from github

1011.name: ErrLoadingPathsetCode
1011.short_description: Could not create a pathset for static component generation
